column8: Perhaps because of its out - of - the - way location in a business district where you would never normally expect to find a restaurant, this restaurant has made every effort to become one of the best in the region, aided by its skilful and gifted chef. Creative cuisine accompanied by an excellent wine list, with a panoramic roof garden for summer dining.
